languages.text: {n}Арджента качает головой.{/n} "Служить Императору, чтобы получить лучшую судьбу? Какое недостойное стремление лежит в основе веры Тассеры! Этому миру нужны миссионеры, чтобы наставить его на путь истинный, пока еще не поздно".

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента качает головой.{/n} "Служить Императору, чтобы получить лучшую судьбу? Какое недостойное стремление лежит в основе веры Тассеры! Этому миру нужны миссионеры, чтобы наставить его на путь истинный, пока еще не поздно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor for the promise of a better fate? That is a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor for the promise of a better fate? That is a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

{n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは首を横に振った。{/n} 「よりマシな運命のために皇帝に仕える？ そんなものがタセラの信仰の土台か。哀れだな。手遅れになる前に、この世界を正しい道に戻すため宣教師を送り込め」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは首を横に振った。{/n} "よりマシな運命のために皇帝に仕える？ そんなものがタセラの信仰の土台か。哀れだな。手遅れになる前に、この世界を正しい道に戻すため宣教師を送り込め。"

languages.text: {n}Argenta menea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Servir al Emperador únicamente para medrar en la vida? ¡Qué penosa motivación para la fe en Thassera! Habría que traer misioneros a este mundo para meterlo en vereda mientras aún estemos a tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta menea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Servir al Emperador únicamente para medrar en la vida? ¡Qué penosa motivación para la fe en Thassera! Habría que traer misioneros a este mundo para meterlo en vereda mientras aún estemos a tiempo».

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔摇起了头。{/n}“侍奉帝皇，仅仅是为了赢得更美妙的命运？塔瑟拉的信仰基础简直是摇摇欲坠！必须把布道士派到这个世界，帮助这个世界走上正确的道路，趁一切还来得及。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔摇起了头。{/n}“侍奉帝皇，仅仅是为了赢得更美妙的命运？塔瑟拉的信仰基础简直是摇摇欲坠！必须把布道士派到这个世界，帮助这个世界走上正确的道路，趁一切还来得及。”

languages.text: {n}Argenta schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Dem Imperator für ein besseres Schicksal dienen? Was für ein armseliges Glaubensfundament! Wir müssen Missionare entsenden, die diese Welt auf den rechten Weg führen, solange noch Zeit ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Dem Imperator für ein besseres Schicksal dienen? Was für ein armseliges Glaubensfundament! Wir müssen Missionare entsenden, die diese Welt auf den rechten Weg führen, solange noch Zeit ist."

languages.text: {n}Argenta secoue la tête.{/n} « Servir l'Empereur dans le simple espoir d'améliorer son sort ? Décidément, la foi sur Thassera fait peine à voir ! Il faut envoyer des missionnaires sur cette planète pour la remettre sur le droit chemin tant qu'il est encore temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta secoue la tête.{/n} « Servir l'Empereur dans le simple espoir d'améliorer son sort ? Décidément, la foi sur Thassera fait peine à voir ! Il faut envoyer des missionnaires sur cette planète pour la remettre sur le droit chemin tant qu'il est encore temps. »

languages.text: {n}Argenta başını sallıyor.{/n} "Daha iyi bir kadere sahip olmak için İmparator'a hizmet etmek mi? Thassera'da inancın temeli ne kadar acınasıymış. Hâlâ fırsat varken bu dünyayı doğru yola sokmak üzere buraya misyonerler gönderilmeli."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shakes her head.{/n} "Serving the Emperor merely to earn a better fate? What a pitiful foundation for faith on Thassera! Missionaries must be sent here to set this world upon the true path, while there is still time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta başını sallıyor.{/n} "Daha iyi bir kadere sahip olmak için İmparator'a hizmet etmek mi? Thassera'da inancın temeli ne kadar acınasıymış. Hâlâ fırsat varken bu dünyayı doğru yola sokmak üzere buraya misyonerler gönderilmeli."
